trustfund:
TF023604-SAUDI FUND FOR DEVELOPMENT -
            COURTHOUSES AND ROADS PROGRAM,TF023757-SAUDI FUND FOR DEVELOPMENT -
            LEGAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF026063-WBG - LEGAL DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The ratings for the project were as
            follows: the outcome was unsatisfactory, the sustainability
            was highly unlikely, the institutional development impact
            was negligible, the Bank performance was unsatisfactory, and
            the borrower performance was highly unsatisfactory,. The
            lessons learned indicate that exclusion of key stakeholders
            in preparation and implementation significantly reduce
            benefits. Follow-up on key indicators needs to be sustained
            throughout the entire duration of the project and
            requirements regarding periodic reporting by the borrower
            should be enforced. Careful coordination with other donors
            is important to maximize benefits. Uncoordinated activities
            can easily result in duplication of efforts or diversion of
            efforts into lower-priority areas. The Legal Development
            Project confirmed the general lesson from reform projects:
            reform, including judicial reform, is a long-term process,
            highly dependent on political will. To have the maximum
            impact, technical reform initiatives should ideally be
            planned to complement political progress on creation of the
            legal and political foundation for reform initiatives.
